Paragraph: To better understand the nonlinear compositional dependence of the J SC values , the space - chargelimited current ( SCLC ) of hole - only devices of the P1 , P3 , P4 , P5 , and P7 blended devices were measured and compared ( Figure S5 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P1 |
| P3 |
| P4 |
| P5 |
| P7 |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "P1", "P3", "P4", "P5", and "P7". These are the names of the blended devices for which the space-charge-limited current (SCLC) of hole-only devices were measured and compared.
